articles.author: Nick Robertson
articles.title: Johnson says Biden ‘projecting weakness’ after meeting with Xi Jinping - The Hill
articles.description: Speaker Mike Johnson (R-La.) ripped President Biden for his meeting with Chinese President Xi Jinping this week, claiming the president was “projecting weakness.” Biden and Xi met in San Francisco on Wednesday during the Asia-Pacific Economic Cooperation (APE…
